node.name: Assign rubric to students for peer assessment

textHTML.p: Instructor assigns students, individually or in groups, to review the work produced by peers using a rubric or template.
Individually or in small groups, students review another individual's or group's work using the rubric or template.
Students provide peers with feedback in writing or prepared for oral presentation.

node.name: Review and change work based on feedback

textHTML.p: Individually or in small groups, students review feedback and decide how to make changes.
